item.title: Maybe It Wasn’t Such a Great Idea to Support a Larger, More Extensive Federal Government for 100 Years
item.description: The Left gets hoisted on its own petard.

item.title: The Supreme Court Killed March Madness
item.description: The Cinderellas simply can’t compete anymore.

item.title: Diane Sykes: A Model Judge
item.description: The chief judge of the Seventh Circuit is an example for others to follow — including in her decision to retire.

item.title: The Trump Administration Shouldn’t Disarm Itself Against Iran
item.description: Closing the Middle East Broadcast Network is not making America great again in a region critical to President Trump’s foreign policy agenda.

item.title: A Visit to the National Gallery, a High Point in the Swamp
item.description: It’s back to the ’70s in a first-rate photo show; plus, an overstuffed, overwrought Elizabeth Catlett show. But the place, as always, looks great.
